title: Celecoxib
summary: Celecoxib, sold under the brand name Celebrex among others, is a COX-2 inhibitor and nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID).[5] It is used to treat the pain and inflammation in osteoarthritis, acute pain in adults, rheumatoid arthritis, ankylosing spondylitis, painful menstruation, and juvenile rheumatoid arthritis.[5] It may also be used to decrease the risk of colorectal adenomas in people with familial adenomatous polyposis.[5] It is taken by mouth.[5] Benefits are typically seen within an hour.[5]
